description: Swiss International Style: Grid-based, high whitespace, typography-driven.
layout_rules: Strict adherence to a 12-column grid system; align all elements to grid lines.
Use 'Split Screen' layout: Large Typography on Left (60%), Details on Right (40%).
Negative Space Ratio must be at least 60% of the canvas.
Use heavy horizontal dividers (lines) to separate sections.
typography_rules: H1 Title must be MASSIVE (scale 4.0x body), Sans-Serif, Helvetica-style.
Body text must be small (10-12pt equivalent) with high line-height (1.6).
No centered text. EVERYTHING must be Left-Aligned.

generative_rules.missing_content_strategy: Generate a 'Data Block' (e.g., '01. Strategy', '02. Design') to fill vertical space if text is short.

description: Modern Tech: Sharp polygons, glassmorphism cards, deep gradients.
layout_rules: Place 'poly_back' asset at top-right with 100% opacity as a solid accent.
Place 'poly_front' asset at bottom-left with 10% opacity as a watermark.
Content must be inside a 'Glass Card' (White fill 0.1 opacity + Blur + Stroke).
typography_rules: H1 must be Monospace or Techno font style.
Use numeric counters (01, 02, 03) for feature lists.
CTA button must be a sharp rectangle (no rounded corners) with a glowing stroke.

generative_rules.missing_content_strategy: Generate a dummy 'Code Snippet' visual or 'Binary Pattern' if background feels empty.

description: Organic Flow: Soft curves, calming colors, approachable layout.
layout_rules: Anchor the Curve Kit at the BOTTOM (Foundation).
Apply Global Layering Rule: XL (Back/Fade), L (Mid/Color), M (Front/White Container).
Curve M should act as the container for the main body text.
typography_rules: H1 must be a Serif or Rounded Sans font (friendly feel).
Body text color should be Dark Grey (#333), never pure Black (#000).
CTA button must be fully rounded (Pill shape).

generative_rules.missing_content_strategy: Generate 3 circular icon placeholders with labels (e.g., 'Natural', 'Safe', 'Trusted').

description: Maximalist Event: Dark mode, neon strokes, chaotic energy.
layout_rules: Assets (poly_back, poly_front) must have NO FILL, only NEON STROKE (2px).
Overlay assets on top of text slightly for depth (Z-index play).
Layout should be slightly asymmetrical to create movement.
typography_rules: H1 must be UPPERCASE, Italic/Oblique, and extend edge-to-edge.
Use 'Stroked Text' (No fill, white outline) for secondary headlines.
CTA must be massive and tilted (-5 degrees if possible).

generative_rules.missing_content_strategy: Repeat the main title 3 times in the background with low opacity (0.05) as a pattern.
